entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
